attributes.action: Do not lower our food standards.
attributes.additional_details: Government is the only way to process this request
attributes.background:
Our food standards protect the health and welfare of our nation. 
Do not lower them for any reason. 
Do not allow lower standard food into our country.
Please sign and share it onwards.

rejection.details:
You are concerned about the UK's food standards but don't specify how you want them to be protected or maintained. 

You may wish to sign these petitions on this issue instead:

Legislate in the Agriculture Bill to protect the UK’s Food & Farming Sector: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321419

Disallow Food that is Lower than the Minimum UK Production & Welfare Standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326837
